Admin - Class in de.db.derpate.model
This dataclass is used to store Admins login credentials and to make the Admin recognized as such, as the LoginUser stored in the user's HttpSession (see LoginManager) can be typecasted back.

AES256EncryptionUtil - Class in de.db.derpate.util
This util uses a 256 bit AES algorithm with Galois Counter Mode (GCM) provided by the SpringFramework.
AES256EncryptionUtil(String, String) - Constructor for class de.db.derpate.util.AES256EncryptionUtil
Creates a new Instance with the given password and salt.
SpringFramework's BytesEncryptor says: "The provided salt is expected to be hex-encoded; it should be random and at least 8 bytes in length.
AES256EncryptionUtilTest - Class in de.db.derpate.util

attachCSRFHeader(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Static method in class de.db.derpate.servlet.LoginServlet
Attaches a header to the given HttpServletResponse, that the client can use for a new request
attachNewTokenToHttpResponse(HttpSession, HttpServletResponse, CSRFForm) - Static method in class de.db.derpate.util.CSRFPreventionUtil
Attaches a http header to the HttpServletResponse, that includes a new valid csrf token
Should be used, when a valid token was sent beforehand!
attributes - Variable in class de.db.derpate.util.DefaultHttpSession
